definition: big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother

sentences.english: By 1982 AIDS had been detected on five continents
sentences.chinese: 到1982年，五大洲皆有艾滋病例報告。

sentences.english: Rattle is widely distributed throughout the world, five continents.
sentences.chinese: 撥浪鼓在世界各地分佈很廣，五大洲都有。

sentences.english: The book enchants the readers of five continents.
sentences.chinese: 這本書風魔了五大洲的讀者。

sentences.english: They came from 123 countries of five Continents.
sentences.chinese: 這些人士來自五大洲的123個國家。

sentences.english: The five Olympic rings symbolize five continents.
sentences.chinese: 奧運五環象徵着五大洲。

definition: all over the world/everywhere/in all parts of the world
Africa/abbr. for 阿非利加洲[A1 fei1 li4 jia1 Zhou1]
America (including North, Central and South America)/the Americas/abbr. for 亞美利加洲|亚美利加洲[Ya4 mei3 li4 jia1 Zhou1]
Latin America/abbr. for 拉丁美洲
Asia/abbr. for 亞細亞洲|亚细亚洲[Ya4 xi4 ya4 Zhou1]
domestic and international/at home and abroad
